api_list.name: /muteChat
api_list.code:

url = "https://api-whatsapp1.p.rapidapi.com/muteChat"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-whatsapp1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
